{"id":1267675395,"question_id":3434,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1716652967,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"37 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1267675395/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Number of Distinct Colors Among the Balls","memory":"97.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[] queryResults(int limit, int[][] queries) {\n        \n        int len = queries.length;\n        Map<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>(); // color cnt\n        \n        // int[] ball = new int[limit+1];\n        Map<Integer, Integer> ball = new HashMap<>();\n        \n        \n        \n        int cnt=0;\n        int[] res = new int[len];       \n        for(int i =0 ;i<len ;i++){\n            int x = queries[i][0];\n            int y = queries[i][1];\n            \n            \n            if(!ball.containsKey(x)){\n            \n                if(!map.containsKey(y)){\n                    map.put(y, 1);\n                    \n                    \n                }else{\n                    map.put(y, map.getOrDefault(y, 0)+1);\n                }\n            }else{\n                \n                \n                int cur = ball.get(x);\n                \n                map.put(cur, map.get(cur)-1);\n                if(map.get(cur)==0)\n                    map.remove(cur);\n                        \n                map.put(y, map.getOrDefault(y, 0)+1);\n                \n            }\n            \n            ball.put(x, y);\n            \n            \n            res[i] = map.size();\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-number-of-distinct-colors-among-the-balls","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
